data.eml:eml: Redescription of the holotype of Bostrichoclerus bicornus Van Dyke, 1938, a rare species of the New World Tillinae Fauna (Coleoptera: Cleridae), with some taxonomic notes

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Burke, Alan F., Leavengood, John M., Scholtz, Clarke H., Sole, Catherine L. (2019): Redescription of the holotype of Bostrichoclerus bicornus Van Dyke, 1938, a rare species of the New World Tillinae Fauna (Coleoptera: Cleridae), with some taxonomic notes. Zootaxa 4544 (4): 548-556, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4544.4.5
